About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

I graduated at 2017 from university and I worked at companies as geomatics engineer. When I started my master's degree I decided to combine Software Engineering and Geomatics engineer. I focused on deep learning and remote sensing. During the my master's degree, I realized that I like to lost in code more than measure, design, develop systems for collecting and analyzing spatial information about the enviroment. I said to myself "Why am I not a software engineer? " however I did not dare to change my career and leave my academia, friends, professors and students.

After moved to UK, I said that new life new career and I started to Become a FrontEnd Developer. I got courses and I designed 5 diffrent project with I learned. It's never to late change to career, I found the profession that will make me happy. In my development journey, I've honed my skills in responsive design, user interface design, and back-end database integration, ensuring that the web applications I create are both visually appealing and functionally robust. I thrive on utilizing frameworks like Bootstrap, CSS, and Tailwind to enhance user engagement and accessibility, and I'm experienced in integrating APIs to add dynamic functionalities.

Outside of coding, I'm passionate about healthy living and enjoy activities like running, cycling, pilates, and yoga. I believe in the power of a balanced lifestyle to fuel creativity and productivity in both work and life.
